The Paisley Ultrasonic Ceramic Diffuser uses ultrasonic waves to instantly vaporize water and essential oils to produce a cool, dry, fragrant mist.
Two mist modes
Auto shut-off when water runs out.
Lights up in 7 popular colors: White, yellow, green, teal, blue, purple, and red!
Includes: diffuser base and cap, ceramic sleeve, measuring cup, and electrical cord.
Cheerful Essential Oils sold separately.
